name: Android SDK Codespace
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl unzip && apt-get clean
postStartCommand:
curl -o /tmp/sdk-tools.zip https://dl.google.com/android/repository/commandlinetools-linux-7583922_latest.zip && \
                       unzip -d /opt/android-sdk /tmp/sdk-tools.zip && \
                       rm /tmp/sdk-tools.zip && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'platform-tools' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'build-tools;30.0.2' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'platforms;android-30' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'extras;google;m2repository' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'extras;android;m2repository' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'patcher;v4' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'cmdline-tools;latest' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'ndk;22.0.7026061' && \
                       echo 'y' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=/opt/android-sdk --install 'cmake;3.10.2.4988404'
